Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Longicornsin (defensin-like; UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; hard ticks, Nuttalliellidae, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC25922 or 23A or 27A (MIC 3.2-6.4 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC2592 or 6A or 15A (MIC 0.8-1.6 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa 3A (MIC 3.2 ug/ml), H. pylori NCTC11637 (MIC 6.4 ug/ml), and C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 25.6 ug/ml).Toxicity: rabbit RBC: not hemo.lytic (1.2% hemolysis at 200 ug/ml).Updated 2/2024
Literature Information.Author: Lu X, Che Q, Lv Y, Wang M, Lu Z, Feng F, Liu J, Yu H2010
Literature Information.Title: A novel defensin-like peptide from salivary glands of the hard tick, Haemaphysalis longicorn
